eoi.firstPleaseSeeIfYourOrg: First, please see if your organization is already registered as a GBIF publisher.
eoi.ifYouAreAffiliatedWithTheSelectedOrganiz: If you are affiliated with the selected organization, you should approach the contact for practical knowledge of data publishing.
eoi.myOrgIsNotRegistered: My organization is not already registered.
eoi.iHaveReadAndUnderstood: I have read and understood [GBIF's Data Publisher Agreement](/terms/data-publisher) and agree to its terms.
eoi.iUnderstandThatIAmSeekingRegistrationOnB: I understand that I am seeking registration on behalf of my organization, and confirm that the responsible authorities of my organization are aware of this registration.
eoi.iUnderstandThatMyOrganizationalInformati: I understand that my organizational information, including the contact details provided, will be made publicly available through GBIF.org.
eoi.whoCanWeApproachForQuestions: Who can we approach for questions about your organization, for example how you appear on our web pages, data licensing issues etc.
eoi.rememberToPrefixWithCountryCode: Remember to prefix with country code
eoi.weNeedToKnowHowToKeepInTouchWithYou: We need to know how to keep in touch with you.
eoi.peopleMoveOn: People move on! Please add at least one alternate contact, and consider using a generic email e.g. helpdesk@a.com that will always reach an appropriate person.
eoi.pleaseCheckSuggestionBelow: To support publishers and review data quality all publishers are associated with a GBIF node. Please check the suggestion below, and correct it if needed:
eoi.marineDataPublishers: Marine data publishers: request endorsement for OBIS (Ocean Biogeographic Information System) related data
eoi.orSelectAnotherAssOrg: If endorsement through the country node suggested above is not the right option, please check this list of associated participants for multinational or thematic networks:
eoi.helpUsUnderstand: Help us understand what kind of data you plan to publish, and what support you may need.
eoi.publOfFourTypesOfData: GBIF.org supports publication of four types of data, explained [here.](/dataset-classes) Responsibility for formatting the data and hosting the original datasets remains with the data publisher, but we can help you find appropriate technical solutions.
eoi.whichTypesOfData: Which types of data do you expect to publish?
eoi.doYouHaveCapacity: Do you have EITHER the capacity to run a live server, OR access to a server, through which you will make your original dataset available to GBIF.org?
eoi.reuseTrustedIPThosting: In this case, it is recommended that you first try reusing an existing trusted [IPT data hosting centre](https://github.com/gbif/ipt/wiki/dataHostingCentre)
eoi.doYouNeedHelpPublishing: Do you need help in publishing your data?
eoi.areYouPlanningToInstallAndRun: Are you planning to install and run publishing software (such as the [Integrated Publishing Toolkit – IPT](/ipt) to publish your data directly to GBIF.org?
eoi.yourChanceToTellGBIF: Your chance to tell GBIF users who you are and what you do.
eoi.pleaseProvideAvalidWebsite: Please provide a valid website address
eoi.brieflyDescribeScope: Briefly describe the scope of your institution/organization in relation to GBIF's mission (e.g. collection holdings, research focus, biodiversity information management, etc.). This description will appear on your publisher page.
eoi.clickMapToAddOrg: Click on the map to add your organization
eoi.areYouAssociatedWithProgramme: Are you associated with a project funded by a GBIF programme ?
eoi.exampleProgramme: For example: Biodiversity Information for Development (BID), Biodiversity Information Fund for Asia (BIFA), Capacity Enhancement Support Programme (CESP).
eoi.pleaseEnterProjectIdentifier: Please enter the project identifier - e.g. BID-CA2016-0000-NAC
eoi.techContactDescription: Who can we approach for technical information such as sending passwords to register data publishing tools?
eoi.forSomeReason: For some reason, your submission failed.
eoi.pleaseContactUs: Please contact us about your interest at helpdesk@gbif.org.
eoi.weHaveRecieved: We have received your expression of interest of becoming a data publisher in the GBIF network.
eoi.youWillRecieveConfEmail: You will receive a confirmation email once your endorsement has been approved.
eoi.outage: We are experiencing a partial outage and do not accept registrations at the moment
eoi.eoiDescription: To prepare for publishing data through GBIF, we ask prospective new publishers to complete this online form. Before GBIF indexes your datasets, your institution must receive endorsement as a data publisher from one of the countries or organizations participating in GBIF, through a GBIF Participant node. If your country is not yet participating in GBIF, we will seek endorsement on your behalf from the GBIF community.
